Package w4160.engine.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Camera class holds the attributes of a camera
    DirectionalLight
    A DirectionalLight is one where all the light rays are parallel, with no starting position.
    Material
    This class specifies the Material properties of an object.
    Mesh
    A class containing the structure of an object, as well as texture and material.
    OBJLoader
    This class implements the method that loads an .obj file and returns a Mesh instance.
    PointLight
    A PointLight is one where light rays radiate from a given position.
    PointLight.Attenuation  
    ShaderProgram
    This class reads, compiles, and links vertex and/or fragment shader.
    Texture  
    Transformation
    This class contains methods to calculate the several matrices needed to transform all objects in a scene to the display window.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GLSLShaderException  
    OBJFormatException
